Description:
Perfect for All Types of Buyers!
Sitting on a generous allotment of 539sqm, situated in a growth suburb of Corio this property is a must to inspect. This 3-bedroom home is waiting for the new owners to renovate, invest or just move in and enjoy.
Comprising of spacious open plan lounge area with solid hardwood floors, air-conditioner and ducted heating for all year-round comfort. An updated fully functional kitchen with dishwasher, free standing oven/cook top, pantry and ample storage space. Down the hall you will find 3 generous size bedrooms all with BIR's serviced by the family bathroom with vanity and shower/bath.
Outside you have a pergola area ideal for entertaining and a large front yard enclosed perfect for children/ pets. Other features include a large laundry with separate toilet, garden shed, double lock-up garage and ample parking in driveway.
Located across the road from Hendy Street Reserve and within a short scroll to schools, shops & public transport. Only moments from the Corio Central Shopping Centre and minutes to the Geelong Ring Road for Melbourne and Surf Coast commuters and just around the corner from the Princes Highway. With being in a convenient location and full of potential, this property is worth considering.
Potential rent: $320 per week
Insights: 89 Plantation Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
A smart choice.
Situated on a 557m2 (approx.) block with endless indoor-outdoor entertaining is this well-loved home in the heart of Corio. The home itself comprises of 3 generous bedrooms (all with BIR's) and an impressive central bathroom with separate toilet & laundry.
Upon entrance to the right you will be impressed with the first living area, following on through the property is the large updated kitchen area which meets the most demanding of needs coming complete with ample cupboard and bench space, all of this overlooking the second living room.
Step into your own private outdoor alfresco area at the rear of the home perfect for entertaining family or friends. Other features of the home include reverse cycle air-conditioning, ducted heating, water tank, double car port and single car garage.
Located in a sought after neighbourhood surrounded by multiple reserves and all major amenities within easy reach.
Close by to local schools, Corio Shopping Centre and the Princes Highway for commuters is right at your door, what more could you ask for?
Don't hesitate, secure this beautifully presented home today.
Insights: 13 Atami Crescent, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

"PRICED TO SELL - PRIME INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY!"
Situated just a hop, skip and a jump from Corio central shopping complex making you within walking distance to schools, shops & public transport is this well-presented 3 bedroom family home. With an updated kitchen and bathroom, large light-filled living area with an open kitchen/dining room plus a large backyard with a single lock up garage and extra parking for an additional 4 cars, this property lends itself to first home buyers and investors alike! Quick and easy access to Princes Hwy & Geelong Ring Road for commuters, don't miss out on this opportunity.

-Split System Heating and Cooling
-Central Location
-Public Transport, Schools, Shops & Medical Facilities Close By

***POTENTIAL RENT RETURN OF $320-$330/WEEK***

Description:
Spacious, bright & perfectly positioned.
In lovely garden colour, this brick charmer on 570m2 (approx). has been home to just one happy family for the last half century - now it's ready to fulfil the dreams of another family. Neatly maintained with many classic features retained, this homely treasure greets you with an entry into a sunlit foyer. Cleverly zoned for a modern family with a private master bedroom (WIR and ensuite) and a secondary bedroom wing at the rear, this haven enjoys a heart-warming lounge featuring room to dine and entertain beside a comfortable kitchen with plentiful bench and storage space, plus a warmly positioned casual meals zone. Stepping into the rear of the home you are greeted by a low maintenance yard complete with a veggie garden and undercover alfresco area perfect for entertaining the family during those warmer months. Lovingly maintained for easy care living, this light filled retreat is private, peaceful and very secure. Featuring air conditioning, single car garage accommodation, garden shed and walking distance to primary schools, public transport and within a short drive to the Princes Highway, this is the complete family home package.
Insights: 4 Fieldman Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
" Investors , don't miss out"
Situated in a central location within walking distance to Corio central shopping centre, schools, shops, kindergartens and medical facilities - this immaculately presented unit with a long term tenant that would love the opportunity to stay on is priced to sell. 2 large bedrooms with BIR's, large living room, kitchen with separate dining space, split system heating & cooling, an extra large backyard plus a single lock up garage. Bus stop within 20 metres from the unit, easy access to the Geelong Ring Rd & Princes Hwy for commuting plus a 5 minute drive to Corio/North Shore train station. Currently tenanted with a magnificent tenant at $240/week until Jan 2020.

-Extremely neat and tidy
-A large backyard with high fences

-Amazing tenant until Jan 2020 paying $240/week

Description:
Huge 871m2 (approx.) potential.
Situated on approx. 871m2, this fabulous property has plenty of potential and opens up endless options to the astute buyer. Offering huge potential to first home buyers, developers looking to expand their options in the near future (STCA) or a great opportunity to add to your property portfolio.
Comprising open kitchen/living/dining area with an additional adjoining large living space and separate meals area, 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 1 toilet and ample shedding at the rear of the home with two carports.
Featuring built in robes in the bedrooms, gas heating, air conditioning, ceiling fans and 2 under cover alfresco areas perfect for entertaining.
Located only minutes drive to Corio Shopping Centre and medical suites, Princes Highway and Ring Road for those that commute to Melbourne. Don't miss out on one of Geelong fastest growing areas.

Description:
Best value in Rose Park Estate
Set in the ever popular Rose Park Estate in Corio, just minutes to Corio Village, Ring Road access plus schools and sporting amenities nearby, this handy location will make life easy.
The well presented brick veneer home features 2 living areas, spacious central kitchen with island bar and separate dining area too. There's 3 generous bedrooms with robes, ensuite to master and a beautiful family bathroom with spa bath for relaxing after a hard days work. The family living area opens onto the covered alfresco area with manicured lawns, vegie garden and access to the double remote garage, all on a 402m2 allotment. This home is all about easy care living and is the perfect investment, first home or downsizer property. With potential rental of $385pw it's sure to be snapped up quickly. Call today for more information.

Description:
Fantastic Starter!
Looking for your first home or your first investment? Well this property has everything for you, well maintained and located only a hop skip and a jump to everything including Corio Village shopping Centre, schools and public transport and will to appeal to first home buyers and investors alike. Consisting of 3 good size bedrooms with near new carpets, large lounge with gas heating, kitchen/dining area with plenty of cupboard space plus clean and tidy bathroom. Situated on a 560m2 allotment within the residential growth zone schedule 2 the back yard houses a single garage and offers a secure space for the kids to play in. Description:
Spacious, Renovated Family Home
Set on a corner block & just moments away from public transport, the ring road, local convenience stores & Corio Central Shopping Centre. Plentiful with schooling options, Northern Bay Colleges, Wexford P-8 & Goldsworthy Y9-12 campuses just minutes away, St Francis Xavier, Geelong Baptist College, Geelong Grammar School , Covenant College & Kardinia International College all within close proximity. Under an hour to Melbourne and 10-15 mins to Geelongs CBD, this location will make a great investment opportunity or first home to enjoy.
- 3 good sized bedrooms (2 with built in robes) all with ceiling fans
- Fully renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances including gas cooktop, dishwasher & new tiling
- Central family bathroom with bath & shower, separate toilet
- New carpet to living/bedrooms/hallway
- Light filled lounge with coonara heater, split system & ceiling fan
- Corner block with side & backyard access to oversized single garage
- 536sqm block (approx.)
- Potential rental return $330 - $340 p/w
- South facing backyard
- Solar system
In a great locale, this home would suit an array of buyers.

Description:
Oozing potential.
In the heart of Corio we present this charming home set on a massive 1,054m2 (approx.) allotment.
The home features three bedrooms with built in robe's and the main bathroom has a vanity, shower and bath while the large kitchen has ample cupboard and bench space, electric cooking, pantry and breakfast bench.
Flow through the large combined dining and living area that's really comfortable and provides oil heating plus reverse cycle air conditioning.
This magnificent 1,054m2 (approx.) parcel of land lends itself to future development ideal for builders and savvy investors with an eye for value and future profit (STCA).
Outside you will also find a double garage, single garage, and there is also an abundance of space for more cars or toys. Located in a great neighbourhood with schools, shops & transport close by plus easy access to the Ring Road and Princes Highway.

Description:
This home ticks all the boxes.
This home ticks all the boxes, situated on approx. 541m2, this fabulous property opens up endless options to the astute buyer. Offering huge potential to first home buyers or a great opportunity to add to your property portfolio, this property has plenty of potential.

Located only minutes drive to Corio Shopping Centre, medical suites, schools, Princes Highway and Ring Road for those that commute to Melbourne and on the doorstep to the best coastline Australia has to offer. Don't miss out on one of Geelong's fastest growing areas.

Description:
Conveniently Located Home in the Heart of Corio
This semi-detached duplex is set on a generous block of 616sqm approx. and conveniently located a short stroll to Corio Shopping Centre, schools, medical facilities & public transport. This is a perfect option for first home buyers wanting room to grow or the savvy investor looking at a prime property with potential for a fantastic rental return. Upon entering the brick home, the ground floor has a large light filled lounge & separate kitchen/dining room with laundry and separate toilet to the rear. The backdoor provides access to a large backyard perfect for entertaining and plenty of room for the kids to play. Upstairs there are three good sized bedrooms, two have built-in robes and a separate bathroom with shower and bath at the end of the hall. Come and inspect this Corio gem - tightly held for over 50 years and reap the benefits of all that this area has to offer!
Sale in conjunction with Vendor Advocacy Australia Pty Ltd

Description:
Feature packed on (approx.) 697m2.
In an amazing location, we present this updated three bedroom home perfect for a family or investor. The charming home is made for entertaining. The renovated kitchen with ample cupboard space, walk in pantry with access to the entertaining area, gas cooking and combined dining area is just the beginning. With a large lounge room with gas log fire, ceiling fan and air conditioning, bathroom with shower and vanity, separate laundry, separate toilet and the other two bedrooms are a comfortable size. Have the kids playing in the backyard on the 697m2 (approx.) subdividable allotment (STCA) and with a double length carport, single garage with workshop there is an abundance of space for cars or toys. Located a few minutes walk away from Corio's shopping complex, with schools & transport close by, plus easy access to the Ring Road.

Description:
Open living with great outdoor space
Set back from the street, you will enjoy extra privacy, plenty of living space and a large outdoor area. With the 3 bedrooms set to the front and flowing through to the main living area the floorplan has been well thought out. The spacious dining and living area is flooded with an abundance of natural light and timber flooring ensuring it will appeal to a wide range of buyers seeking a comfortable home. With a modern kitchen featuring a gas stove, electric oven, breakfast bar you can whip up dinner while entertaining friends and family. Two bedrooms enjoy built-in robes while the master offers a large walk-in robe and access to a two-way bathroom. The central bathroom offers a separate bath and shower, direct access to the master bedroom and a separate toilet. For extra convenience the single garage with remote roller door internal access into the home. Conveniently located within easy reach of Aldi, Corio Village shopping centre and public trasnport, there will be no shortage of buyers attracted to this impressive home.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Great position, 739m2 (approx.) block.
Situated on approx. 739m2, this fabulous property opens up endless options to the astute buyer. Offering huge potential to first home buyers, developers looking to expand their options in the near future (STCA) or a great opportunity to add to your property portfolio, this property has plenty of potential.
Comprising kitchen area with a huge adjoining living space, 3 generous bedrooms, 1 updated bathroom, 1 toilet, second living area and a single garage plus shed/storage area.
Featuring a BIR in the main bedroom plus split system A/C, ceiling fans in two bedrooms, gas heating in the main living area, separate split system A/C in both living areas and an undercover alfresco area for entertaining.
Located close by Corio Shopping Centre, medical suites and ALDI, minutes drive to Princes Hwy and Ring Road for those that commute to Melbourne.
Don't miss out on one of Geelong fastest growing areas.
Insights: 34 Michigan Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Care, Quality & a Real Surprise
A picturesque facade gives this home a lovely feel with a large open verandah and a beautiful tree that frames the frontage but even more enticing is what is on the inside. Having been held by the same family for around 50 years this home has been extended and updated to make life easier and more enjoyable. With the spacious and solid kitchen that features the dishwasher, new stove, loads of bench space and walk-in-pantry which flows to the meals and living zone. Step through in the expansive lounge where you can watch the world go by from behind the significant Rylock windows. 3 large bedrooms each with built-in-robes and a renovated bathroom modified for special needs plus there is a second toilet and a split system for comfort. This solid home features a lush and private backyard which is lovely with a remote access garage and all of this is handy to Corio Shopping Central, schools, transport and offering seamless access to the Ring Road. A rare offering not to be missed.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 28 Princess Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
